title: Stocks Close Lower While Chip Names Outperform Broad Market | Closing Bell
description: Comprehensive cross-platform coverage of the U.S. market close on Bloomberg Television, Bloomberg Radio, and YouTube with Romaine Bostick, Emily Graffeo, Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. (Source: Bloomberg)
